column1: UK Public Data Project – meta-data pro-forma
Unique identifier for this dataset.Lower-case alphanumeric and dashes only.
column2:
Display title (not a description).
Do not end with a full stop.
column4: Description about the dataset. First sentence should be a succinct brief description, followed by more if needed.
column5: When the data was initially released to the public.
column6: When the data was most recently updated.
column7: How often this data will be updated.
column20: The ONS categories under which this dataset falls
column21: Indicate whether this is a National Statistic or not.
column22: The data's given precision (e.g. "to the nearest per cent")
column23: Internet link to a page about this data.
column24: Internet link directly to the dataset.
column25: If the dataset is supplied in multiple formats, give each format a separate entry.
column26: Brief description to clarify when there are multiple downloads.
column27: Internet link to a page about the taxonomies used, if available.
column28: The Department under which this data is collected or published.
column29: The Agency or Arms Length Body that is responsible for the dataset, if appropriate.
column30: Permanent contact point for members of the public; not an individual.
column34: The licence that the data is under. Should generally be core UK Crown Copyright.
column35:
Quick labels to describe the dataset.
Lowercase alphanumeric and dashes, each tag seperated by a space.

column4: A monthly-updated list of all financial transactions spending over £25,000 made by DEPARTMENT, as part of the Government's commitment to transparency in expenditure.
column34: UK Crown Copyright with data.gov.uk rights
